Posts.Content: Jan 23, 2008 08:50PM jay66 wrote: I too had micromets out of 7 nodes removed there was 2 benign tumours 2, with micromets under 2mm and 3 clear. They left it at that had a masectomy as the cancer was multifocal and my margins where clear. The only thing was thay said the would be agressive with my treatments as the cancer was agressive. I worried heaps and about the micromets but my onc seems to say that being under 2mm makes it hard for the to attach anywhere and grow hence lots of chemo to kill off any strays. Best wishes.
